abstract: Rex W. Tillerson, Exxon Mobil’s chairman and chief executive, beat back a shareholder effort to take away one of his jobs, avoiding a serious rebuke to his authority.
snippet: Rex W. Tillerson, Exxon Mobil’s chairman and chief executive, beat back a shareholder effort to take away one of his jobs, avoiding a serious rebuke to his authority.
lead_paragraph: DALLAS  Exxon Mobil’s chairman and chief executive, Rex W. Tillerson, defeated a shareholder effort on Wednesday to take away one of his jobs at an annual meeting punctuated by a debate of the company’s policy toward renewable energy and global warming.

headline.main: Exxon Rejects Proposals Backed by Rockefellers
headline.print_headline: Exxon Rejects Proposals Backed by Rockefellers

abstract: Exxon Mobil‘s chairman and chief executive, Rex W. Tillerson, defeated a shareholder effort on Wednesday to take away one of his jobs at an annual meeting punctuated by a debate of the company’s policy toward renewable energy and global warming.

headline.main: Exxon Rejects Proposals Backed by Rockefellers
